Article Management System

The Best way to manage your articles and other documents!

Find Out More

Organized documents is what we all want!

Most of the time, we failed to keep track of and organize the documents or articles in our system. It is obvious whenever we need to write a paper that requires extensive research. Organizing our resources, articles, and documents would be a great help to easily write the paper. Similarly, school publications could have a big benefit if only they have a cost-efficient way of organizing their articles. They can save a lot of time by having a systematic way of managing and organizing their articles.

This project aims to develop an application that manages articles and documents of an organization or an individual using the concept of object-oriented programming. This will use Java with FXML as its programming language, and MS Access as its database. The feature of this project was the capability of the users to manage their work easily by signing in with their accounts. The system allows the user to add, edit, print, delete and update the specific article. This also permits the user to add notes to keep track of the important reminders for that article/document.

Features

Try it Now!

Secured System

With tightened and strong user validation, users can assure that their documents and articles are secured. Also, the application is reliable in maintaining the documents so data loss can be prevented.

Interactive Viewing of Article

Since the system uses HTML for formatting the document, the user can add video links and interactive objects in the document. The system enables not only reading but also audio-visual materials.

Adding of Image and Notes

The user can add images to the documents with specific captions, and photographer. The user can add notes to the documents that are very helpful in organizing them. It will be essential in keeping track of the important reminders that need to be done in the articles.

Printing of Article

With the help of the system, the user can instantly print the article or choose to save them as a PDF document.

Future Work

Article Management System is an application that can organize and manage articles and documents. Due to the limited time, knowledge and resources, this application was not able to have many features and fulfill the expected outcome so the developers are looking forward to improving this application by giving more attributes or aspects like scanning the articles, having QR code and has the ability to share or distribute it to other users. Scanning the articles and having a QR code would be a perfect feature for this application because it will help the users in an easier way like once they printed a specific article, it will have its own QR code then we can scan its code to be able to see that article in the system. Also, the developers aim to implement a fast searching for the article in further development.
